description.english: Defeat Production Overlord Embryo
description.german: Besiege den Produktionsaufseher Embryo.
description.french: Bats Embryo le chef de production
description.italian: Sconfiggi il signore della produzione Embryo
description.spanish: Derrota al Amo de la Producción Embryo.
description.japanese: 生産部門監督者 エンブリオを倒す

description.english: Defeat Hydroponics Controller Vespula
description.german: Besiege den Hydrokultur-Aufseher Vespula.
description.french: Bats Vespula la contrôleuse hydroponie
description.italian: Sconfiggi il controllore idroponico Vespula
description.spanish: Derrota a la Controladora Hidropónica Vespula.
description.japanese: 水耕システム運用者 ヴェスピューラを倒す

description.english: Defeat Security Administrator Justice
description.german: Besiege den Sicherheitsbeauftragten Justice.
description.french: Bats Justice l'administrateur de sécurité
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'amministratore della sicurezza Justice
description.spanish: Derrota al Administrador de Seguridad Justice.
description.japanese: セキュリティ管理者 ジャスティスを倒す

description.english: Defeat Superstructure Engineer Venom
description.german: Besiege den Bautechniker Venom.
description.french: Bats Venom l'ingénieur superstructures
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'ingegnere superstrutturale Venom
description.spanish: Derrota al Ingeniero de Superestructuras Venom
description.japanese: 船外エンジニア ヴェノムを倒す

description.english: Rescue the Genki Star
description.german: Rette die Genki Star.
description.french: Sauve le Genki Star
description.italian: Salva la Stella Genki
description.spanish: Rescata el Genki Star
description.japanese: ゲンキスターを救う

description.english: Destroy 15,000 homicidal robots
description.german: Zerstöre 15.000 gefährliche Roboter.
description.french: Détruis 15 000 robots meurtriers
description.italian: Distruggi 15.000 robot assassini
description.spanish: Destruye 15.000 robots
description.japanese: ロボットを15,000体破壊する

description.english: Defeat one of Embryo's phases before he can relocate
description.german: Besiege eine von Embryos Phasen, bevor er den Ort wechselt.
description.french: Bats un des cycles d'Embryo avant qu'il ne change de position
description.italian: Sconfiggi una delle fasi di Embryo prima che si sposti
description.spanish: Derrota una forma de Embryo antes de que se pueda mover
description.japanese: エンブリオが場所を移動する前にフェーズを１つクリアする。

description.english: Destroy every laser fence In Justice's first phase
description.german: Zerstöre jeden Laser-Zaun in Justices erster Phase.
description.french: Détruis toutes les clôtures lasers du premier cycle de Justice
description.italian: Distruggi ogni recinzione laser durante la prima fase di Justice
description.spanish: Destruye las barreras láser de la primera fase de Justice
description.japanese: ジャスティス戦の最初のフェーズですべてのレーザーフェンスを破壊する

displayName.japanese: マキシマムオーバードライブ

description.english: Collect every Battery dropped in the Collider level
description.german: Sammle jeden Akku, der im Teilchenbeschleuniger-Level fallengelassen wird.
description.french: Collecte toutes les batteries tombées au niveau Collider
description.italian: Raccogli ogni batteria rilasciata nel livello Urtatore
description.spanish: Recoge todas las baterías del nivel de Enfrentamiento
description.japanese: 「コリダー」ステージで落とされたすべてのバッテリーを拾う

description.english: Reach a chain of 100
description.german: Führe eine 100er-Combo aus.
description.french: Réalise une chaîne de 100
description.italian: Raggiungi 100 chain
description.spanish: Logra una cadena de 100
description.japanese: 100チェインを達成する

description.english: Reach a chain of 1000
description.german: Führe eine 1000er-Combo aus.
description.french: Réalise une chaîne de 1000
description.italian: Raggiungi 1000 chain
description.spanish: Logra una cadena de 1000
description.japanese: 1000チェインを達成する

description.english: Reach Layer 15 in Infinity Drive mode
description.german: Erreiche Ebene 15 im Endlos-Drive-Modus.
description.french: Atteins l'étage 15 en mode Entraînement infini
description.italian: Raggiungi il layer 15 nella modalità Avventura Infinita
description.spanish: Llega A La Capa 15 En El Modo Drive Infinito
description.japanese: インフィニティドライブでレイヤー15に到達する

description.english: Reach layer 25 in Infinity Drive mode
description.german: Erreiche Ebene 25 im Endlos-Drive-Modus.
description.french: Atteins l'étage 25 en mode entraînement infini
description.italian: Raggiungi il layer 25 nella modalità Avventura Infinita
description.spanish: Llega A La Capa 25 Del Modo Drive Infinito
description.japanese: インフィニティドライブでレイヤー25に到達する

displayName.japanese: アルティメットボスキラー

description.english: Complete Boss Rush mode
description.german: Schließe den Boss-Rush-Modus ab.
description.french: Termine le mode Ruée de chef
description.italian: Completa la modalità Boss Rush
description.spanish: Completa el Modo Boss Rush
description.japanese: ボスラッシュモードをクリアする

description.english: Destroy seven enemies with a single Rail Gun shot
description.german: Zerstöre sieben Gegner mit einem einzigen Railgun-Schuss.
description.french: Détruis sept ennemis en un tir de canon électrique
description.italian: Distruggi sette nemici con un solo colpo di railgun
description.spanish: Destruye 7 enemigos de un disparo con la Rail Gun
description.japanese: レールガンによる一撃で7体の敵を破壊する

description.english: Finish any level without taking damage
description.german: Schließe ein beliebiges Level ab, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Termine un niveau sans subir de dommages
description.italian: Completa un livello senza subire danni
description.spanish: Termina cualquier nivel sin recibir daño
description.japanese: 任意のステージをダメージを受けずにクリアする

description.english: Cause 3 mines to explode in succession without being shot
description.german: Lass mindestens 3 Minen hintereinander explodieren, ohne angeschossen zu werden.
description.french: Fais exploser 3 mines d'affilée sans être touché(e)
description.italian: Fai esplodere 3 mine in successione con un solo colpo
description.spanish: Provoca una explosión de 3 minas seguidas sin recibir daño
description.japanese: 攻撃を食らわずに連続して3つのマインを爆発させる

description.english: Destroy 3 enemies by driving another enemy through them with the Giga Drill
description.german: Zerstöre 3 Gegner, indem du einen anderen Gegner mit dem Megabohrer durch sie hindurchjagst.
description.french: Détruis 3 ennemis en les transperçant avec un autre ennemi à l'aide de la giga foreuse
description.italian: Distruggi 3 nemici spingendo un nemico verso di loro con il Giga Drill
description.spanish: Destruye a 3 enemigos lanzando a otro enemigo contra ellos con el Giga Drill
description.japanese: ギガドリルで敵同士を接触させ、同時に3体の敵を破壊する

description.english: Destroy an enemy with Helo while it's caught by a Singularity
description.german: Zerstöre einen Gegner mit Helo, während er in einer Singularität gefangen ist.
description.french: Détruis un ennemis avec Helo pendant qu'il est prisonnier d'un Singularité
description.italian: Distruggi un nemico con Helo mentre è catturato da una Singularity
description.spanish: Destruye a un enemigo con Helo mientras es capturado por una Singularity
description.japanese: シンギュラリティで捕らえた敵をヘローで破壊する

displayName.german: Hör auf, auf dich selbst zu schießen

description.english: Lead the laser turret to defeat Medulla
description.german: Besiege Medulla mit dem Laser-Drehturm.
description.french: Dirige la tourelle laser pour battre Medulla
description.italian: Controlla la torretta laser per sconfiggere Medulla
description.spanish: Usa la Torreta láser para vencer a Medulla
description.japanese: レーザータレットを誘導してメダラを倒す

description.english: Earn an S+ rank on any level
description.german: Erreiche in einem beliebigen Level Rang S+.
description.french: Obtiens un rang S+ dans un niveau
description.italian: Ottieni un rank S+ in un qualsiasi livello
description.spanish: Obtén una clasificación S+
description.japanese: 任意のステージでS+ランクを取得する

description.english: Earn an S+ ranking on all campaign levels
description.german: Erreiche in allen Kampagnen-Leveln Rang S+.
description.french: Obtiens un rang S+ dans tous les niveaux de campagne
description.italian: Ottieni un rank S+ in tutti i livelli della campagna
description.spanish: Consigue calificación de S+ en todos los niveles de campaña
description.japanese: 全てのキャンペーンステージでS+ランクを取得する

displayName.french: De la toile, rien que de la toile

description.english: Drop a cannonball down the hole in Filament
description.german: Lass in Filament eine Kanonenkugel ins Loch fallen.
description.french: Lâche un boulet de canon dans le trou de filament
description.italian: Lancia una palla di cannone fino al Filamento
description.spanish: Lanza una bala de cañón por un hoyo en el Filamento
description.japanese: 「フィラメント」ステージで、キャノンボールを穴の中に落とす

description.english: Activate an EX Option
description.german: Aktiviere eine EX-Option.
description.french: Active une option EX
description.italian: Attiva un'opzione EX
description.spanish: Activa una Opción EX
description.japanese: エクストラオプションを有効にする

description.english: Play as 8 Androids
description.german: Spiele als alle 8 Androiden.
description.french: Incarne les 8 androïdes
description.italian: Gioca con otto Androidi
description.spanish: Juega con 8 Androides
description.japanese: 8体アンドロイドでプレイする

description.english: Unlock all items in the Art Gallery
description.german: Schalte alle Einträge in der Galerie frei.
description.french: Déverrouille tous les articles de la Galerie d'art
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli oggetti della Art Gallery
description.spanish: Desbloquea toda la Galería de Arte
description.japanese: アートギャラリーの項目をすべて解除する

description.english: Unlock all items in the Codex
description.german: Schalte alle Einträge im Codex frei.
description.french: Déverrouille tous les items du Codex
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli oggetti del Codex
description.spanish: Desbloquea todo el Codex
description.japanese: データベースの項目をすべて解除する

description.english: Unlock all items in EX Options
description.german: Schalte alle Einträge in den EX-Optionen frei.
description.french: Déverrouille tous les items des Options EX
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli oggetti delle opzioni EX
description.spanish: Desbloquea los items en Opciones EX
description.japanese: エクストラオプションの項目をすべて解除する

description.english: Unlock any item that costs credits
description.german: Schalte einen beliebiges Item frei, das Credits kostet.
description.french: Déverrouille n'importe quel item qui nécessite du crédit
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli oggetti che costano crediti
description.spanish: Desbloquea cualquier item que cueste créditos
description.japanese: クレジットを使って任意の項目を解除する
